mapper.insert: INSERT INTO feed SET user_id = #{userId}, district_id = #{districtId}, title = #{title}, cafe_name = #{cafeName}, content = #{content}
mapper.select: SELECT A.feed_id AS feedId, A.title, B.nickname, DATE(A.created_at) AS createdAt, A.view_count AS viewCount, COUNT(C.feed_id) AS feedLike FROM feed A INNER JOIN `user` B ON A.user_id = B.user_id LEFT JOIN likes C ON A.feed_id = C.feed_id WHERE NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM report D WHERE D.action_status = 1 AND D.feed_id = A.feed_id ) GROUP BY A.feed_id, title, nickname, DATE(A.created_at), view_count ORDER BY A.feed_id DESC LIMIT #{startIdx}, #{size}

SELECT A.feed_id AS feedId, A.title, B.nickname, DATE(A.created_at) AS createdAt, A.view_count AS viewCount, COUNT(C.feed_id) AS feedLike FROM feed A INNER JOIN `user` B ON A.user_id = B.user_id LEFT JOIN likes C ON A.feed_id = C.feed_id WHERE A.district_id = #{districtId} AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM report D WHERE D.action_status = 1 AND D.feed_id = A.feed_id ) GROUP BY A.feed_id, title, nickname, DATE(A.created_at), view_count LIMIT #{startIdx}, #{size}

SELECT A.feed_id AS feedId, A.title, B.nickname, A.cafe_name AS cafeName, A.content, A.created_at AS createdAt, A.view_count AS viewCount, IFNULL(C.like_count, 0) AS feedLike, D.feed_pic AS pics FROM feed A INNER JOIN user B ON A.user_id = B.user_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT feed_id, COUNT(*) AS like_count FROM likes GROUP BY feed_id ) C ON A.feed_id = C.feed_id LEFT JOIN feed_pic D ON A.feed_id = D.feed_id WHERE A.feed_id = #{feedId}

SELECT A.feed_id AS feedId, A.cafe_name AS cafeName, C.district_name AS districtName, A.title, B.nickname, A.created_at AS createdAt, COUNT(D.feed_id) AS feedLike FROM feed A INNER JOIN `user` B ON A.user_id = B.user_id INNER JOIN district C ON A.district_id = C.district_id INNER JOIN likes D ON D.feed_id = A.feed_id WHERE NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM report E WHERE E.action_status = 1 AND E.feed_id = A.feed_id ) GROUP BY A.feed_id ORDER BY feedLike DESC, A.feed_id LIMIT 5;
